pyqgis_plugin.name: .DEV ROSOR Waypoint Altitude Embedder
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool to embed alt info into waypoints converting flightlines and surface/ground data into 3D waypoints with given clearance to ensure safe drone navigation

pyqgis_plugin.name: .DEV ROSOR Base Mag QAQC
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool that compares Base mag and Air mag recording times and other QaQc things.

pyqgis_plugin.name: .DEV ROSOR Flightline Creator
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool to create flightlines within a polygon

pyqgis_plugin.name: .DEV ROSOR Lines to Flight
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool that takes parallel flightlines and takeoff location points to plan flights

pyqgis_plugin.name: .DEV ROSOR Mag Clipper
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool that takes proprietary ".magdata" and converts to csv then clips it and does QaQc.

pyqgis_plugin.name: .DEV ROSOR Mass Import CSVs or KMLs
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool to mass import csv or kml files from a folder, and match the file structure using layer groups.

pyqgis_plugin.name: .DEV ROSOR Plugin Template
pyqgis_plugin.description: Peter's tool to easily create new plugins through this base template

pyqgis_plugin.name: .DEV ROSOR Slope Analyzer
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool that shows the user how steep the terrain is.

pyqgis_plugin.name: .DEV ROSOR Tile Maker
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin accepts a polygon as an input and produces tiles. The tiles can be auto-named, merged, and styled. Photos with geotags can be re-organized (move/copy) according to what tiles they are in.
